pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, November 6, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet meeting.

Note for media:

    • Ministers will be available to media in the House of Commons Foyer as of 12:00 p.m.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

Richmond Hill, Ontario

8:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Vishnu Mandir Diwali celebration, and will deliver remarks.

Vishnu Mandir
8640 Yonge Street

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 8:00 p.m.
